short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modern networking meets AI to bring you warmed up leads, quality connections and filled events through LinkedIn collaborations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The days of old-fashioned networking are gone. Our modern world networking connects business owners, entrepreneurs and professionals in new and exciting ways. This extension offers simple solutions for networking, lead generation and sales results!


This fabulous technology uses AI to match you with suitable businesses, then gets you in the door by way of a personal introduction. The CIBN Connect tool facilitates connections, introductions, and conversations on LinkedIn, and we show you how to blend this technology with your online and in person networking experiences.

This fantastic application is powered by the original My Most Trusted and is available free of charge to all the members of CIBN Connect at every level of membership. It is easy to use and powerfully effective for creating warm referral business making it incredibly easy for entrepreneurs to keep track of their trusted ‘inner circle’ connections on LinkedIn. The tool facilitates continued conversation between trusted connections - making it easy to build relationships, keep in touch and share valuable resources and information.

The Match Me Tool is a special feature to match you with suitable businesses and then gets you in the door by way of a personal introduction. Using AI, this useful tool for business networking will provide you with your best matches on a scale from 1 to 10, allowing you to see who is a priority match for you to meet with immediately. These CIBN Match Me Scores will help you make referrals and warm introductions with fellow CIBN Connect members and the trusted connections you meet at our online and in person events. This also assists you in determining who your ideal collaborators would be, and gives you the insight that you need to implement the CIBN Collaboration Strategy which can add an addition $150,000 per year to one’s bottom line.

If you’re still struggling with finding enough connections to sustainably grow your access to opportunities, this app is for you. It will assist you with filling your pipeline with one-on-one appointments locally and around the world - ensuring that you keep growing your business, in a sustainable manner.

Use it to start conversations, set appointments and to fill your events. 

The app offers ongoing training and support for their members to get the most out of this amazing tool.
